duties_responsibilities.duty: Apply remote sensing principles and methods to analyze data and solve geospatial intelligence tasking, collecting, processing, exploitation, and dissemination problems.
Apply knowledge of imagery, products, processes, and sensors to support mission-critical client.
Demonstrate customer support expertise for real-time missions and ad hoc support requests.
Work as part of a dynamic team and independently to provide imagery analysis.

education_certification.credential: TS/SCI clearance with polygraph, HS diploma or GED
